mapper.select: -- getRlabRqprApprCompleteList select mst.rqpr_id as rqprId ,mst.rlab_name as rlabNm ,rgst.sa_name + ' ' + rgst.sa_jobx_name as rgstNm ,dbo.fn_getDeptName(rgst.sa_dept_new) as rgstDeptNm ,rgst.sa_mail as rgstEmail ,chrg.sa_name + ' ' + chrg.sa_jobx_name as chrgNm ,mst.rqpr_dt as rqprDt ,chrg.sa_mail as receivers from iris_rlab_rqpr_mst mst, iris_sso_user rgst, iris_sso_user chrg where mst.rlab_acpc_st_cd = '02' and mst.del_yn = 'N' and mst.rlab_chrg_trsf_flag = 'W' and mst.rgst_id = rgst.sa_user and mst.rlab_chrg_id = chrg.sa_user
